item.hallownest.old_nail.tooltip_1: A traditional weapon of Hallownest. Its blade is blunt with age and wear.
item.hallownest.old_nail.tooltip_2: Get above enemies to bounce off of them.
item.hallownest.crystal_heart.tooltip_1: The energy core of an old mining golem, fashioned around a potent crystal.
item.hallownest.crystal_heart.tooltip_2: The crystal's energy can be channeled with a %s to launch the bearer forward at dangerous speeds.
item.hallownest.mask_shard.tooltip_1: A shard of an ancient mask, worn to protect oneself from harm.
item.hallownest.mask_shard.tooltip_2: Collect more to strengthen your shell, protect yourself from damage and gain mysterious abilities.
item.hallownest.ancient_mask.tooltip: A complete mask. When whole, a mask protects its wearer, shielding the true form beneath.
